title: League wont install on windows 10
body: Okay, so, I bought a New laptop today and it has Windows 10 on it, I went to install League, but whenever it trys to install Microsoft C++ it gives me an error and doesnt install, Ive included a picture of the error, can anyone help me?

replies.body: This error usually happens on a new laptop our outdated Windows because the OS is missing necessary components to install.  Yoru best bet is to update Windows to the most recent version, but you can also download the [Visual C++ package](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).  This should get you fixed up!
right click and go to properties and click the compatibility tab and you can choose to run it as an older windows version
try running the installer as an older program
How would i go about doing that? I didnt assume there were more than one version
